duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate and provide speech/language pathology service to patients in the home or facility.
Participate in the development and review of the Plan of Treatment and Plan of Care.
Administer and interpret diagnostic tests and therapeutic treatments.
Provide instruction, training, and counseling to patients, families, and healthcare staff.
Participate in care coordination activities and discharge planning.
Maintain the highest standards of professional conduct and confidentiality.
Attend, participate in, and conduct internal staff development programs.

education_certification.credential: Certification of Clinical Competence in Speech Language Pathology or Audiology granted by ASHA
